I'm very sorry for the delay, it was due to technical reasons. I hope everyone is having a happy Eid!

Last Saturday we learned BFS, here is a simulator of the algorithm: http://algorasim.com/BFS/

More problems will be added to day 7 soon once they are available.

Here is the code for a simple bfs search from source to destination. Depending on the problem, you may have to add a cost array or other conditions in the bfs function. http://ideone.com/J92HVv

Also you can keep some variables global or decide to add parameters, depends on your coding style.

Good luck, next week we will be solving some more bfs questions and introducing DFS (Depth First Search).
